alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:12PM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SNOW RETURNING IN THE CASCADE MOUNTAINS SUNDAY INTO MONDAY... .Snow in the mountains will return on Sunday with wintry weather expected for the Cascades. Snow intensity will increase Sunday evening with Stevens Pass becoming snow covered at times through Sunday night into Monday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 1 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 7 and 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
